3D0F6013.Line17.804B7: Strange…the door is locked with an earthen seal. What was it my father said about this…

5A270F7C.Line1.804B7: Airidah wouldn't have barred the path of the dead like this. The spirits should be free to roam within the earth.

5B73C86E.Line21.804B7: If you bring me one from the nearby cairns, I think I can open the way.

8D458BE0.VoiceDir17.804B7: Curious. Deep in thought/almost to himself for the last sentence (trying to remember something from his past)

ABA9F43B.VoiceDir21.804B7: Unsure of himself for the last part of the sentence
